title: Avast blocking my League Of Legends
body:
*New to the board 
--
So my anti-virus -- 'Avast !' is blocking my league of legends and I can't reconnect to games..  (I can still press play and log in etc. I just can't reconnect to games after champ select ; loading screen)
Anyone know how to fix this ? 
I enjoy play League Of Legends and I do NOT want to get banned.. :(

replies.body:
It may be related to this : http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/xz4swYQc-help-cant-reconnect

How do you know it is avast blocking the connection?

So, I just found this...(see attached).

Avast seems to think there is a virus in the newest Lol update : http://malwarefixes.com/threats/win32evo-gen-susp/
I went into the avast virus chest and restored the file avast found to be malware, and added an exception, and now it is working ok.
